branchCategory.name: C(D)J5-S, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stainless Steel
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ5-S is a small bore stainless steel cylinder, designed for use in environments with water spray (such as food processing machines). A special scraper (standard) prevents water from entering the cylinder. Non-toxic additives allow confident use in equipment for food, beverage and medical products, etc. The CJ5-S series can be disassembled for replacement of seals.</p>
